item.title: Docs: Embedded Checkout Form
item.description:
The difference between this form, and Checkout Form mentioned before, is that this must be invoked inside a custom page of the merchant.

The integration of this form into your site or app, provides your users a simplified and responsive payment experience that is suitable for both web and mobile applications.
